Package customProduct

Class CustomProductBuilderController

  • java.lang.Object
    • customProduct.CustomProductBuilderController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class CustomProductBuilderController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This class displays the "Create custom product" screen. Using this screen, the customer can select products or items for creating custom product.

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private void addProductIntoOverViewVBox​(SelectedHBox overViewSelected)
      This method adding the product in the overviewHBox after the customer selected the product that he wants in the custom prodct.
      private void changeAddToCartButtonEvent()
      This method checking 2 scenrios: If the customer editing the quantity of each product/items in custom product through the cart.
      private void changeBackToCatalogButtonEvent()
      After adding the custom product to the cart, if the customer selected the view cart, it will change to cart screen.
      (package private) void changeToHomeScreen​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      This method chaning the screen to the home screen if the customer pressed on the button.
      private void checkSelectedInSelector()
      This method checking the checkbox that selected in the selectorHBox (where all the prodcuts/items that customer can select).
      private void getAllProductsFromOverview()
      This method getting all the product from the voerview to create custom product for the customer.
      private double getTotalDiscountPriceFromOverview()
      This method calculate the total price by selecting products/items with discount to the total price.
      private double getTotalPriceFromOverview()
      This method calculates the total price of products/items that selected in the overview.
      private void initEditProduct()  
      void initialize​(java.net.URL location, java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
      This method initialize the "Create custom product" screen.

      This method checking if the selected items/products have discount.
      private boolean isDiscountInPrice()
      Checking if the product/items contains discount.
      private void removeFromOverView​(SelectedHBox overViewSelected)
      This method removes items/product if the customer decided to remove the product/items that he selected.
      private void selectCustomProductProducts()
      This method init the selected products by the customer in the hbox of the custom product overview.
      private void selectProductItems()
      This method init the selected items by the customer in the hbox of the custom product overview.

      This method adding the custom product to the cart.
      (package private) void setBackToCatalogButton()
      This method changing screen to catalog if the customer pressed on the button.
      private void setCheckBoxToFalse()
      Setting the checkbox to false if the customer removed product/item from the overview in "Create Custom Product".
      private void switchFillAllFields()
      This method Opens an alert for selecting products/items to the custom product.
      void updateOverviewScrollPane​(java.lang.String command, SelectedHBox overViewSelected)
      This method checks if the customer selected products/items, it will change the checkbox to true and add the product/items to the overview hbox.
      static void updateOverViewVBox​(java.lang.String command, SelectedHBox overViewSelected)
      This method updated the overview of the custom product by the products/items that the customer selected in the screen.
      private void updateTotalPrice()
      This method updates the total price depending on the products/items that selected by the customer.
      static void updateTotalPriceLabel()
      This method will update the total price by using the updaeTotalPrice that updates the total price depending on the products/items that selected by the customer.

    • Method Detail

      • setAddToCartButton

        void setAddToCartButton()
        This method adding the custom product to the cart. It displays a popup that he can view cart or go back to catalog. If no products selected from the current screen, it will display an alert to the customer.

      • switchFillAllFields

        private void switchFillAllFields()
        This method Opens an alert for selecting products/items to the custom product.

      • getAllProductsFromOverview

        private void getAllProductsFromOverview()
        This method getting all the product from the voerview to create custom product for the customer.

        This method changing screen to catalog if the customer pressed on the button.

        MouseEvent -

      • initialize

        public void initialize​(java.net.URL location,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
        This method initialize the "Create custom product" screen. It sets the button to the screen, init the items and the products so the customer can create custom product.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

      • changeBackToCatalogButtonEvent

        private void changeBackToCatalogButtonEvent()
        After adding the custom product to the cart, if the customer selected the view cart, it will change to cart screen.

      • changeAddToCartButtonEvent

        private void changeAddToCartButtonEvent()
        This method checking 2 scenrios: If the customer editing the quantity of each product/items in custom product through the cart. If the customer editing the product through the cart - it will display the custom product screen to edit the product.

      • updateOverViewVBox

      • updateOverviewScrollPane

        public void updateOverviewScrollPane​(java.lang.String command,
                                     SelectedHBox overViewSelected)
        This method checks if the customer selected products/items, it will change the checkbox to true and add the product/items to the overview hbox.

        Parameters:
        overViewSelected -

      • setCheckBoxToFalse

        private void setCheckBoxToFalse()
        Setting the checkbox to false if the customer removed product/item from the overview in "Create Custom Product".

      • updateTotalPriceLabel

        public static void updateTotalPriceLabel()
        This method will update the total price by using the updaeTotalPrice that updates the total price depending on the products/items that selected by the customer.

      • updateTotalPrice

        private void updateTotalPrice()
        This method updates the total price depending on the products/items that selected by the customer. If the customer selected products/items with discount, it will update will a discount price and original price.

      • getTotalPriceFromOverview

        private double getTotalPriceFromOverview()
        This method calculates the total price of products/items that selected in the overview.
        Returns:
        totalPrice without discounts.

      • getTotalDiscountPriceFromOverview

        private double getTotalDiscountPriceFromOverview()
        This method calculate the total price by selecting products/items with discount to the total price.
        Returns:
        the totalDiscount by selecting products/items with discount.

      • isDiscount

        private boolean isDiscount()
        This method checking if the selected items/products have discount.
        Returns:
        true or false depeding on the selected products/items.

      • isDiscountInPrice

        private boolean isDiscountInPrice()
        Checking if the product/items contains discount.
        Returns:
        true or false
